events.message: The policyholder reported a collision involving their vehicle with another car at an intersection. They have provided initial details and photo evidence of the damage.
The claim was reviewed and classified under the Auto Accident cluster due to the nature of the reported incident involving two cars.
An agent specializing in auto claims has been assigned to handle the policyholder's case, ensuring a smooth and efficient resolution process.
The policyholder received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been officially acknowledged and is now being processed.
Additional documents such as the police report, repair estimates, and driver’s license copies were requested to further support the claim assessment.
The policyholder submitted all requested documents promptly, including the police report and photos of the damaged vehicle, facilitating the investigation.
An investigation team has commenced evaluating the details surrounding the auto accident to determine liability and assess the claim validity.
The investigation into the collision has been completed with findings documented. Liability has been assigned and damage costs are estimated.
A settlement offer has been proposed to the policyholder, covering repair costs and rental car reimbursement as per the policy terms.
The policyholder responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the communication and handling of the claim.
The claim was officially approved following acceptance of the settlement offer, authorizing the release of funds for vehicle repairs.
The payment covering the approved settlement amount was issued to the policyholder’s designated account to proceed with the car repairs.
The auto accident claim case has been officially closed after confirmation of repair completion and final satisfaction from the policyholder.
